Description.Text: Erofili is a traditional 3-star hotel offering modern accommodation northeast of Volos. Highlights include a cafe and a good location close to the centre of Portaria. Portaria is a picturesque town situated on Mount Pelion. It boasts a traditional town square, winding cobbled paths and a variety of restaurants and tavernas. Regional places of interest include Pagasitikos Bay in Volos and the Ski Centre of Pelion. The hotel is housed in a traditional low-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are 21-23sqm and decorated in a modern style with warm colours and wood floors. They have a view of Volos and some include a balcony. Amenities include a flat-screen TV, air-conditioning and a fridge. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The cafe serves a variety of hot and cold beverages and delicious deserts and boasts a terrace. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Chargeable parking is possible nearby. Free parking is possible nearby.
